general.title: General UI Branding
general.realmSuffixHelp: This suffix will be used to generate the account realms of accounts created via your white-labeled interface

allowCustomerRequest.title: Submitting port requests:
allowCustomerRequest.yes: Allow customers to request a port
allowCustomerRequest.no: I will request ports on behalf of customers

manageCustomerPorts.title: Managing port requests:
manageCustomerPorts.yes: I will manage port requests from my account
manageCustomerPorts.no: My provider will manage port requests from my account

choices.title: Choices available to the user to setup the no_match route:
choices.help1: The first option is will be the one set by default in the account.
choices.help2: Enabling more than one option will let the user customize this setting.

templates.subject: Subject:

recipientTypes.specified: Specified: Write down a list of comma-separated e-mail addresses.
recipientTypes.admins: Admins: This e-mail will be sent to all the account administrators.
recipientTypes.original: Original User: This e-mail will be sent to the original user that triggered it.

templates.previewHeader: You can preview this notification by sending a test e-mail to the following address:
templates.restoreButtonDisabled: No modification has been saved for this notification yet. If you want to keep the default notification, simply click on "Cancel".
templates.restoreWarning: This notification template will be restored to its default values, and any customization you made will be discarded.

editIconTooltips.disabled: DISABLED: This template has been disabled. No email will be sent by the system for this notification until you re-enable it.
editIconTooltips.custom: CUSTOM: This template has been customized. Emails sent by the system for this notification will be using this custom template.
editIconTooltips.default: DEFAULT: This template has not been customized. Emails sent by the system for this notification will be using the default template.

alertMessages.logoWrongType: Your logo must be in either a JPEG or PNG format.
alertMessages.logoWrongSize: Your logo must not exceed 192px in width and 62px in height.
alertMessages.deleteConfirm: This will completely delete both General and Advanced branding information. Do you want to continue?
alertMessages.closeTemplateConfirm: Any unsaved change made to this template will be discarded. Do you want to continue?
alertMessages.templatePreviewSuccess: The notification preview has been sent to {{email_address}}
alertMessages.iconWrongSize: Your icon must not exceed 64px in width and 64px in height.

whitelabel.saveInfoMessage: Some changes will only take effect after reloading the application.
